text:
Overview
Tomcat 3.2.2b5 
If standard 'out of the box' tomcat is run with -security.  The examples number 
guess causes a NullPointerException in jasper/runtime/JspFactoryImpl.java.  This 
is because it cannot handle an AccessControlException in the cleanup phase.

Setup
Standard downloaded 3.2.2b5

Results
An AccessControlException occurs during getPageContext().

java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError: java.security.AccessControlException: acc
ess denied (java.util.PropertyPermission line.separator read)

Therefore during the finally{} clause of the generated code of the jsp it calls 
releasePageContext() with a null page context.  JspFactoryImpl does no check for 
null.  This is fixed in 3.3 sources but not in 3.2

Browser sees Internal servlet error and a jasper exception

I have tested the fix.  In this case Netscape comes up with a popup and says 
'the page contained no data'.
creator: adb@teamware.com
